comment: Reminder that mainstream media coverage of the Proud Boys is basically indistinguishable from that of the Traditionalist Worker's Party or David Duke or whatever. Criticizing people to the right of you for brownie points is so obviously futile that you have to be willfully in denial of reality to even bother trying it.
amr:
# ::snt Reminder that mainstream media coverage of the Proud Boys is basically indistinguishable from that of the Traditionalist Worker's Party or David Duke or whatever. Criticizing people to the right of you for brownie points is so obviously futile that you have to be willfully in denial of reality to even bother trying it.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / remind-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (p / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (d / distinguish-01
                        :ARG1 (c / cover-03

                                    :ARG1-of (m3 / mainstream-02))
                              :ARG1 (o / organization
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Proud"
                                          :op2 "Boys")))
                        :ARG2 (c2 / cover-03
                              :ARG0 (o2 / or
                                    :op1 (o3 / organization
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Traditionalist"
                                                :op2 "Workers"
                                                :op3 "Party"))
                                    :op2 (p2 / person
                                          :name (n3 / name
                                                :op1 "David"
                                                :op2 "Duke"))
                                    :op3 (w / whatever)))
                        :mod (b / basic))))
      :snt2 (f / futile
            :domain (c3 / criticize-01
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person
                        :ARG1-of (r2 / right-04
                              :ARG2 y2))
                  :ARG2 (p4 / point
                        :mod (b2 / brownie)))
            :ARG1-of (o4 / obvious-01
                  :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG1 c3
                        :ARG3 (s / so)
                        :ARG6 (o5 / obligate-01
                              :ARG1 y2
                              :ARG2 (d2 / deny-01
                                    :ARG0 y2
                                    :ARG1 (r3 / reality)
                                    :ARG1-of (w2 / will-02
                                          :ARG0 y2)
                                    :purpose (b3 / bother-02
                                          :ARG0 y2
                                          :ARG1 (t / try-01
                                                :ARG0 y2
                                                :ARG1 c3
                                                :mod (e / even)))))))))

comment: "I completely destroyed my credibility and the left still doesn't appreciate me"
